entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Periods of rain beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
